languages.text: {n}Фактотум почтительно склоняет голову:{/n} "Какое мудрое решение, Ваша Светлость! Одним выстрелом — двух серф... То есть, как чудесно, что дети будут учиться и получать награду за прилежание!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Фактотум почтительно склоняет голову{/n}: "Какое мудрое решение, Ваша Светлость! Одним выстрелом — двух серф... То есть, как чудесно, что дети будут учиться и получать награду за прилежание!"

languages.text: {n}The Factotum bows his head in deference.{/n} "A wise decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Two serfs with one shot— That is to say, it is good to know that the children will both learn and be rewarded for their diligence!"
languages.original_text: {n}Фактотум почтительно склоняет голову:{/n} "Какое мудрое решение, Ваша Светлость! Одним выстрелом — двух серф... То есть, как чудесно, что дети будут учиться и получать награду за прилежание!"

{n}The Factotum bows his head in deference.{/n} "A wise decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Two serfs with one shot— That is to say, it is good to know that the children will both learn and be rewarded for their diligence!"

{n}The Factotum bows his head in deference.{/n} "A wise decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Two serfs with one shot— That is to say, it is good to know that the children will both learn and be rewarded for their diligence!"

{n}The Factotum bows his head in deference.{/n} "A wise decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Two serfs with one shot— That is to say, it is good to know that the children will both learn and be rewarded for their diligence!"

languages.text: {n}Le factotum incline la tête avec respect.{/n} « Sage décision, Votre Seigneurie. Nous ferons ainsi d'un serf deux coups... J'entends par là qu'il est bon de savoir que ces enfants apprendront tout en récoltant les fruits de leur sérieux ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum bows his head in deference.{/n} "A wise decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Two serfs with one shot— That is to say, it is good to know that the children will both learn and be rewarded for their diligence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le factotum incline la tête avec respect.{/n} « Sage décision, Votre Seigneurie. Nous ferons ainsi d'un serf deux coups... J'entends par là qu'il est bon de savoir que ces enfants apprendront tout en récoltant les fruits de leur sérieux ! »

languages.text: {n}El Factótum hace una reverencia respetuosa.{/n} «¡Una sabia decisión, mil{mf|ord|ady}! Así matamos dos pájaros de un tiro: ¡me parece estupendo que los niños aprendan y que, al mismo tiempo, se les recompense por su diligencia!».
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum bows his head in deference.{/n} "A wise decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Two serfs with one shot— That is to say, it is good to know that the children will both learn and be rewarded for their diligence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El Factótum hace una reverencia respetuosa.{/n} «¡Una sabia decisión, mil{mf|ord|ady}! Así matamos dos pájaros de un tiro: ¡me parece estupendo que los niños aprendan y que, al mismo tiempo, se les recompense por su diligencia!».

languages.text: {n}ファクトタムは敬意を表して頭を下げた。{/n}「賢明なご判断です、陛下！一発で2人の農奴を…つまり、子供たちが学ぶと同時に、その勤勉さが報われることを知って安心しました！」
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum bows his head in deference.{/n} "A wise decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Two serfs with one shot— That is to say, it is good to know that the children will both learn and be rewarded for their diligence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ファクトタムは敬意を表して頭を下げた。{/n}「賢明なご判断です、陛下！一発で二人の農奴を…つまり、子供たちが学ぶと同時に、その勤勉さが報われることを知って安心しました！」

languages.text: {n}高阶顾问尊重地低头致意。{/n}“真是个明智的决定，大人！一箭双雕！这样一来，孩子们既能学到知识，又能通过勤奋学习得到回报，这是件好事！”
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum bows his head in deference.{/n} "A wise decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Two serfs with one shot— That is to say, it is good to know that the children will both learn and be rewarded for their diligence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}高阶顾问尊重地低头致意。{/n}“真是个明智的决定，大人！一箭双雕！这样一来，孩子们既能学到知识，又能通过勤奋学习得到回报，这是件好事！”

languages.text: {n}Das Faktotum senkt unterwürfig den Kopf.{/n} "Eine kluge Entscheidung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Zwei Sklaven mit einer Klappe ... sozusagen. Es ist gut, zu wissen, dass die Kinder lernen und für ihren Fleiß belohnt werden!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum bows his head in deference.{/n} "A wise decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Two serfs with one shot— That is to say, it is good to know that the children will both learn and be rewarded for their diligence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Faktotum senkt unterwürfig den Kopf.{/n} "Eine kluge Entscheidung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Zwei Sklaven mit einer Klappe ... sozusagen. Es ist gut, zu wissen, dass die Kinder lernen und für ihren Fleiß belohnt werden!"

languages.text: {n}Arşıkâhya, dikkatli bir şekilde başını eğiyor.{/n} "Mantıklı bir karar {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Bir taşla iki serf vurmuş oluruz. Demem odur ki çocukların hem bir şeyler öğrenip hem de gayretleri karşılığında ödüllendirileceklerini bilmek güzel!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum bows his head in deference.{/n} "A wise decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Two serfs with one shot— That is to say, it is good to know that the children will both learn and be rewarded for their diligence!"
